Departure by land or ferry from St. Petersburg via Finland remains an option. To travel by train to Finland, you must hold a Russian or Finnish passport. Airline routings, capacity & availability are changing rapidly. Regularly check airline websites for the latest info.

Flights from Russia are extremely limited. Numerous countries have closed their airspace to Russian airlines, and a number of airports in southern Russia have closed. Explore travel not through Europe, e.g. the Middle East, and smaller carriers. https://t.co/tXnXziCZMz
